SELECT id, name, mini_price.price, cover_url, created_at FROM product JOIN (SELECT product_id,MIN(price) AS price FROM spec GROUP BY product_id) mini_price ON product.id = mini_price.product_id WHERE (mini_price.price > #{price} OR ( mini_price.price = #{price} AND id > #{lastId})) AND status = 1 ORDER BY mini_price.price ASC,id ASC LIMIT #{pageSize}

SELECT id, name, mini_price.price, cover_url, created_at FROM product JOIN (SELECT product_id,MIN(price) AS price FROM spec GROUP BY product_id) mini_price ON product.id = mini_price.product_id WHERE (mini_price.price < #{price} OR mini_price.price = #{price} AND id < #{lastId}) AND status = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC,id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize}

SELECT id, snowflake_id, name, mini_price.price, cover_url, images, description, status, origin, created_at FROM product JOIN (SELECT product_id,MIN(price) AS price FROM spec GROUP BY product_id) mini_price ON product.id = mini_price.product_id WHERE product.id > #{lastId} AND status = 1 LIMIT #{pageSize}

SELECT product.id, product.name, product.cover_url, product.origin, supplier.name AS supplier_name, COALESCE(COUNT(spec.id),0) AS spec_count, COALESCE(MIN(spec.price),0) AS min_price, COALESCE(MAX(spec.price),0) AS max_price, COALESCE(SUM(real_stock.stock),0) AS total_real_stock, COALESCE(SUM(spec.stock),0) AS onSale_stock, MAX(CASE WHEN real_stock.stock < 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS stock_status, product.status FROM product JOIN supplier ON product.supplier_id = supplier.id LEFT JOIN spec ON product.id = spec.product_id LEFT JOIN real_stock ON spec.id = real_stock.spec_id WHERE product.id < #{lastId} GROUP BY product.id, product.name,product.cover_url,supplier.name ORDER BY product.id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize}

SELECT product.id, product.name, product.cover_url, supplier.name AS supplier_name, COALESCE(COUNT(spec.id),0) AS spec_count, COALESCE(MIN(spec.price),0) AS min_price, COALESCE(MAX(spec.price),0) AS max_price, COALESCE(SUM(real_stock.stock),0) AS total_real_stock, COALESCE(SUM(spec.stock),0) AS onSale_stock, MAX(CASE WHEN real_stock.stock < 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS stock_status FROM product JOIN supplier ON product.supplier_id = supplier.id LEFT JOIN spec ON product.id = spec.product_id LEFT JOIN real_stock ON spec.id = real_stock.spec_id WHERE product.id > #{lastId} GROUP BY product.id, product.name,product.cover_url,supplier.name ORDER BY product.id ASC LIMIT #{pageSize}

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM user),0) AS user_count, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM admin),0) AS admin_count, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM product),0) AS product_count, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `order` WHERE status = 3),0) AS order_count, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM article),0) AS article_count, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM `order` WHERE status = 3),0) AS income_count, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM purchase_record),0) AS expense_count, IFNULL(((SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM `order`) - (SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM purchase_record)),0) AS profit_count FROM DUAL

SELECT months.month AS `month`, (IFNULL(o.total_sales, 0) - IFNULL(p.total_purchase_amount, 0)) AS total_profit FROM ( -- 合并当前传入年份的订单和采购月份 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS month FROM `order` WHERE YEAR(created_at) = #{targetYear} UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS month FROM purchase_record WHERE YEAR(created_at) = #{targetYear} ) months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS order_month, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM `order` WHERE status = 3 AND YEAR(created_at) = #{targetYear} GROUP BY order_month ) o ON months.month = o.order_month LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS purchase_month, SUM(total_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchase_record WHERE YEAR(created_at) = #{targetYear} GROUP BY purchase_month ) p ON months.month = p.purchase_month ORDER BY months.month ASC;
